etymology.description: Depicts a bird with a prominent beak and tail feathers
etymology.interpretation: The character 鳥(鳥) (niǎo, "bird") visually represents a bird, featuring distinct elements such as a beak and tail feathers, capturing its essence through its graphical form.

examples.chinese: 花园里有许多鸟(花園裡有許多鳥)，在空中翱翔(在空中翱翔)。
examples.pinyin: Huāyuán lǐ yǒu xǔduō niǎo, zài kōngzhōng áoxiáng.
examples.english: Many birds soar in the garden.

examples.chinese: 树林中有一只鸟(樹林中有一隻鳥)，在枝头跳跃(在枝頭跳躍)。
examples.pinyin: Shùlín zhōng yǒu yī zhī niǎo, zài zhītóu tiàoyuè.
examples.english: A bird hops on a branch in the forest.

examples.chinese: 海边的天空中飞翔着鸟(海邊的天空中飛翔著鳥)。
examples.pinyin: Hǎibiān de tiānkōng zhōng fēixiáng zhe niǎo.
examples.english: A bird soars in the sky by the seaside.
